description: This file defines a React component for the 'Jobs' page, enabling users to enqueue jobs via a form and displaying a list of jobs. It manages various state variables, handles form submission with API calls, and renders form elements and the JobList component.

methods.name: enqueueJob
methods.description: Asynchronous function that handles form submission to enqueue a new job, parsing parameters, making API POST request, updating UI state, and handling errors.

search-terms: useState hooks for protocol, operation, deviceId
